now next day people ask is mark when
should i go to new orleans well there's
kind of three times i recommend not

july well one is july and two is august
because it's so hot and so humid here at
those times you're just gonna be
miserable and with the bugs and stuff
like that it should just don't don't
just don't okay you can come the rest of
